title: Venezuela tells China oil prices won't be set by the U.S., seeks to reassure investment after Maduro capture
summary_full: Venezuela assured Beijing that its oil pricing will not be dictated by the U.S. and that Chinese investment in the South American country will remain secure.
summary_public: Venezuela assured Beijing that its oil pricing will not be dictated by the U.S. and that Chinese investment in the South American country will remain secure.
